resources.string:
This app allows to send/receive files from another device in Peer to Peer (P2P), with mobile's data. P2P means that the data transferred goes directly from one device to another, without any intermediate server.

To be able to transfer files, both devices need to be on the same local network.
Share data with one of the smartphone and connect the other device to the data shared

To assure a transfer without problems, please make sure that both devices have the latest version of the app

To receive a file, go to the receive screen, Wait for the app to find the sender peer, or enter the peer key of the sender device manually. Once the service started, you can the see the progress on the notification created.
				
				For devices before Android 11, the files are directly downloaded in the 'Download' folder.
				
				Since Android 11, it is prohibited for an app to access all device's files, so the received files are downloaded in a app-private directory. You can manage these files and move them to any directory you want, from the 'Manage received files' screen

\t\t\t\tTo send a file, pick one by clicking on the button. Once it is done, a key will be displayed on the screen, you can eventually provide it to the receiving device but the receiver should be able to detect your device without it.\nAfter the receiving peer will have found your device, the transfer will start.\nYou can the see the progress on the notification created
Waiting for the receiving peer. You can provide the following peer key\n\n%s
The file selected couldn\'t be sent
An error occurred during the transfer: %s
The file couldn\'t be downloaded entirely. You should delete it.
An error occurred during the transfer. The file couldn\'t be downloaded entirely. You should delete it.
Service started. You can see the progress in the notification bar
Error: couldn\'t get size of file
Error: couldn\'t get name of file
Couldn\'t get ip address. Please verify your internet connection
Do you want to receive %s from peer %s?
Service was canceled due to timeout. Please try again
In order to receive a file, the app needs to write on your device. Do you want to grant write permission?
Couldn\'t start looking for senders (are you connected to the internet?)
No sending peer were found. Swipe down to retry
Couldn\'t start transfer with other peer
The received file is corrupted, you should delete it and restart the transfer
You can move this file to your phone\'s accessible storage (e.g your Download folder), or delete this file
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
Couldn\'t get files list. Please retry
Warning: source file couldn\'t be deleted
